snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived for a brief visit marked by the discovery of two bombs that underscored the continued power of sectarian passions.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Clinton arrives in Northern Ireland for brief visit marked by discovery of two bombs that underscore continued power of sectarian passions.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Belfast, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrived for a brief visit marked by the discovery of two bombs that underscored the continued power of sectarian passions.

headline.seo: Bombs Found in Northern Ireland on Eve of Clinton Visit
headline.main: Bombs in Northern Ireland Found Before Clinton Trip Show Strength of Enmity
headline.print_headline: Bombs in Northern Ireland Found Before Clinton Trip Show Strength of Enmity
